results.before:
function redeemOfferToken(string memory details) public {
        _burn(_msgSender(), min); // redeem Offertoken at minimum burn rate 
        
        uint256 rNumber = RR.add(1); 
        
        RR = RR.add(1); // counts new entry to redemption counter 
        
        redemptions[rNumber] = requests( 
            msg.sender,
            details,
            "PENDING",
            "RESERVED",
            rNumber,
            now,
            false);
results.after:
function redeemOfferToken(string calldata details) public {
        _burn(_msgSender(), min); // redeem Offertoken at minimum burn rate 
        
        uint256 rNumber = RR.add(1); 
        
        RR = RR.add(1); // counts new entry to redemption counter 
        
        redemptions[rNumber] = requests( 
            msg.sender,
            details,
            "PENDING",
            "RESERVED",
            rNumber,
            now,
            false);

results.before:
function writeRedemptionResponse(uint256 rNumber, string memory response) public onlyOfferor {
        requests storage rr = redemptions[rNumber]; // retrieve RR data
        
        redemptions[rNumber] = requests( 
            rr.requester,
            rr.details,
            response,
            rr.review,
            rNumber,
            rr.timeStamp,
            true);
results.after:
function writeRedemptionResponse(uint256 rNumber, string calldata response) public onlyOfferor {
        requests storage rr = redemptions[rNumber]; // retrieve RR data
        
        redemptions[rNumber] = requests( 
            rr.requester,
            rr.details,
            response,
            rr.review,
            rNumber,
            rr.timeStamp,
            true);

results.before:
function writeRedemptionReview(uint256 rNumber, string memory review) public {
        requests storage rr = redemptions[rNumber]; // retrieve RR data
        
        require(msg.sender == rr.requester); // only requester can store review of redemption responses
        require(rr.responded == true); // offeror response must be provided prior to review

        redemptions[rNumber] = requests( 
            rr.requester,
            rr.details,
            rr.response,
            review,
            rNumber,
            rr.timeStamp,
            true);
results.after:
function writeRedemptionReview(uint256 rNumber, string calldata review) public {
        requests storage rr = redemptions[rNumber]; // retrieve RR data
        
        require(msg.sender == rr.requester); // only requester can store review of redemption responses
        require(rr.responded == true); // offeror response must be provided prior to review

        redemptions[rNumber] = requests( 
            rr.requester,
            rr.details,
            rr.response,
            review,
            rNumber,
            rr.timeStamp,
            true);

results.before:
function newOfferToken(
        string memory _name, 
        string memory _symbol, 
        string memory _offer, 
        uint256 _init, 
        uint256 _rate,
        uint256 _min,
        uint8 _decimals, 
        address payable _offeror) public {
       
        OT = new offerToken(
            _name, 
            _symbol, 
            _offer, 
            _init, 
            _rate,
            _min,
            _decimals, 
            _offeror);
        
        tokens.push(address(OT));
        
        emit Deployed(address(OT), _offeror);
results.after:
function newOfferToken(
        string calldata _name, 
        string calldata _symbol, 
        string calldata _offer, 
        uint256 _init, 
        uint256 _rate,
        uint256 _min,
        uint8 _decimals, 
        address payable _offeror) public {
       
        OT = new offerToken(
            _name, 
            _symbol, 
            _offer, 
            _init, 
            _rate,
            _min,
            _decimals, 
            _offeror);
        
        tokens.push(address(OT));
        
        emit Deployed(address(OT), _offeror);
